body_html: I'm also getting this issue but on Linux. I've tried installing tensorflow both on AWS EC2 and through herokus python buildpack but in both instances got the error tensorflow-0.7.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform. Was able to get it on the EC2 using this guys conda package but still can't get it on heroku.

body: I'm also getting this issue but on Linux. I've tried installing tensorflow both on AWS EC2 and through herokus python buildpack but in both instances got the error `tensorflow-0.7.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform.` Was able to get it on the EC2 using [this guys conda package](https://conda.anaconda.org/jjhelmus) but still can't get it on heroku.
